casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shenandoah FREEMAN 199P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019
13 May 2019

Gerald K. Robbins, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

Shenandoah Freeman, for Freeman, Shenandoah.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
